content.question: The energy level diagram for a single-electron atom is shown. If the atom is initially in the <math alttext="n equals 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> state and ends up in the <math alttext="n equals 5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> state, which of the following processes most likely occurred?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
